T02n2988u_001:1163: imamarthaṁ ca maṁvijñāya tathāgatāḥ sarvasattvānāṁ cāśrayaṁ vijñāpayanta evaṁ dharmmaṁ deśayanti |
T02n2988u_001:1164: evameva kulaputrā ākāśavada- niruktāste tathāgatasamayā anugantavyāḥ |
T02n2988u_001:1166: nāma kulaputrāḥ kāṇḍaṁ ca mathanīyaṁ ca puruṣahastavyāyā- ma[ñca] pratītya dhūmaḥ prādurbhavati agnimabhinirvarttayati |
T02n2988u_001:1167: sa cāgnirna kāṇḍe sthito na mathanīyasthito na puruṣahasta- vyāyāmasthitaḥ |
T02n2988u_001:1175: ṣoḍaśe paṭale- pātanaṁ vajrasūtrasya rajaso'pi nipātanam |
T02n2988u_001:1176: na kāryyaṁ mantratattvena kārayet nāpi durllabhāḥ || 11 ||
T02n2988u_001:1179: mantra- tattveneti manaḥsantrāṇabhūtatvāt mantrajñānaṁ samyagjñānaṁ nidarśitaṁ ityarthaḥ |
T02n2988u_001:1180: yadyevaṁ mohāt karoti cet bodhi- rduṣkaro bhavatīti |
T02n2988u_001:1181: maṇḍalenādikarmmikasattvakṛpākaruṇā- buddhatvaṁ vajradha[ratvaṁ] ca durlabhaṁ bhavatītyarthaḥ |
T02n2988u_001:1182: tasmāt samyag- jñānābhiyuktena mahāyoginā maṇḍalalikhanapraveśābhi- ṣekādikaṁ niṣiddhaṁ iti |
T02n2988u_001:1225: jñānajñeyaṁ vinā na syāt samāpattirataḥ smṛtā |
T02n2988u_001:1238: ṣaḍbhujaṁ kathyate tena jñānaṁ bauddhaṁ tathāgataiḥ || 30 ||
T02n2988u_001:1240: bodhicittaṁ bhaved vajraṁ prajñā ghaṇṭā vidhīyate |
T02n2988u_001:1252: evam mayā śrutamekasmin samaye bhagavān sarvatathāgata- kāyavākcittahṛdayavajrayoṣidbhageṣu vijahāra ekasminneva kāle |
T02n2988u_001:1257: etaduktaṁ bhavati- sarvatathāgatajñāneṣu anyonyavyāpya- vyāpakabhūteṣu yogino jñānaṁ tadantargatameva sarvathaiva sthita- mini tattvaṁ sarvajñāneṣu krameṇa sthitamityarthaḥ |
T02n2988u_001:1260: uktaṁ ca tattvasaṁgrahe tantrarāje- sarvatathāgatamahābodhi- dṛḍhasattva ityārabhya anādinidhanaḥ śānto bhagavān mahā- bodhisattvavajraḥ samantabhadro mahābodhisattvaḥ sarvatathāgata- hṛdayeṣu vijahāra |
T02n2988u_001:1261: (51) atha sarvatathāgatāḥ prāhuḥ- kathaṁ tvaṁ kulaputrānuttarāṁ samyaksambodhimabhisaṁbhotsyase yastvaṁ sarvatathāgatatattvānyabhi- jñāya iṣṭatarāṇyupahasasīti
T02n2988u_001:1262: sarvārthasiddhibodhisattva āha- bhagavantaḥ sarvatathāgatāḥ ājñāpa[yatha] kathaṁ pratipadyāmīdṛśaṁ tattvamiti |
T02n2988u_001:1263: tathāgatā āhuḥ- pratipadyasva kulaputra svacittapratyave- kṣaṇasamādhānena prakṛtisiddhena rucijaptena mantreṇeti oṁ cittaprativedhaṁ karomīti
T02n2988u_001:1265: ā jñāto bhagavantaḥ sarvatathā- ga[tā]ḥ svahṛdi candramaṇḍalākāraṁ paśyāmi |
T02n2988u_001:1270: yathākramācca- [ndra]maṇḍalaṁ sampūrṇaṁ bhavati tadvat prakṛtiprabhāsvaraṁ citta- ratnamapi paripūrṇaṁ bhavati |
T02n2988u_001:1271: yathā candramaṇḍalamāgantuka- kalābhiḥ sūryyamaṇḍa[la]raśamyapagamāt kramāt pūrṇaṁ dṛśyate tadvat prakṛtipariśuddhaṁ cittaratnamapi sarvakleśamalakalaṅkāpa- gamakramāt paripūrṇabuddhaguṇaṁ dṛśyate iti |
T02n2988u_001:1273: punarnavamapaṭale- svacchaṁ hi sarvasattvānāṁ cittaṁ śāntaṁ prabhāsvaram |
T02n2988u_001:1279: punaśca trayodaśe paṭale- maṇḍalaṁ sarvabuddhānāṁ tattvajñānācca maṇḍalam |
T02n2988u_001:1286: punastatraiva- sa caiva sarvabhāvena sarvadā samavasthitaḥ |
T02n2988u_001:1292: mahāsamayatantre'pi nirddiṣṭam- ahaṁ ca kāmarūpāgraḥ sarvabuddhairadhiṣṭhitaḥ |
T02n2988u_001:1299: tasya tattvam- anādinidhanaḥ sattvo vajrasattvo mahārataḥ |
T02n2988u_001:1312: na bodhirnāpi buddhatvaṁ na sattvo nāpi jīvitā | 47 ||
T02n2988u_001:1314: śrīvajramaṇḍalālaṅkāre nigaditam- sarvatra sarvadhātau tu sarvasattvā[śca] sarvataḥ |
T02n2988u_001:1324: sarvendriyaṁ ca vijñānaṁ cittaṁ sarvatra sarvataḥ || 51 ||
T02n2988u_001:1333: tileṣu va yathā tailaṁ rasa ikṣoḥ prakalpitaḥ || 54 ||
T02n2988u_001:1335: puṣpeṣu vā yathā gandho dadhni navanītaṁ yathā |
T02n2988u_001:1340: sambaratantre nigaditam- na yogaḥ pratibimbeṣu niṣiktādiṣu jāyate |
T02n2988u_001:1358: sarvatra sarvataḥ sarvaṁ sarvathā sarvadā svayam |
T02n2988u_001:1370: punaḥ- anādinidhanaḥ sattvo vajrasattvaḥ paraṁ yataḥ |
T02n2988u_001:1392: na tasyopadravaṁ kiñcit sadā sarvatra vidyate || 5 ||
T02n2988u_001:1398: rakṣā kṛtā tathā naiva yathaiva jñānabhāvinaḥ || 7 ||
T02n2988u_001:1409: (58) jñātayaḥ sarvasattvā vai na paro'styatra ṣaḍgatau |
T02n2988u_001:1412: sthāne deśe gṛhe vā'tha pustake pratimāsu ca |
T02n2988u_001:1438: guruṇāpi hi dṛṣṭena guṇapūrṇā janā yadi |
T02n2988u_001:1444: (60) tato dināvadhiṁ kṛtvā śiṣyāya vacanaṁ vadet |
T02n2988u_001:1447: manasā bhavato vaśyaṁ kuru cittamato dṛḍham |
T02n2988u_001:1448: duṣpūraṇaṁ yato na syāttathā kāryyaṁ mahāmate || 11 ||
T02n2988u_001:1500: puṇyahīnāḥ parāṁ bodhiṁ naiva prāpsyanti durnayāḥ |
T02n2988u_001:1501: itastataśca saṁsāre te bhramanti hi ṣaḍgatau || 28 ||
T02n2988u_001:1506: na teṣāṁ sugatau janma buddhatvaṁ api durlabham |
T02n2988u_001:1513: saṁśayaṁ nahi dharmme tu karttavyamadhunā tvayā || 32 ||
T02n2988u_001:1517: abhiṣekaṁ tvayā prāptaṁ vidyate na [hyataḥ] param || 33 ||
T02n2988u_001:1519: sarvatāthāgatajñānavarābhiṣiktasya yoginaḥ māhātmyaṁ śrīsamāje nirddiṣṭam- tadyathā sarvatathāgatakāyavāk- cittavajraguhyasamabhiṣikto bhagavantaḥ ācāryyāḥ sarvatathā- gataiḥ sarvabodhisattvaiśca kathaṁ draṣṭavyaḥ?
T02n2988u_001:1520: sarvatathāgatāḥ prāhuḥ- bodhicittaṁ vajraṁ iva kulaputrāḥ sarvatathāgataiḥ sarvabodhisattvaiśca draṣṭavyam |
T02n2988u_001:1522: bodhicittavajraścācāryyo dvayameva tadadhikāraṁ yāvat kulaputrāḥ saṁkṣepataḥ kathayāmi |
T02n2988u_001:1523: yāvanto daśadiglokadhātuṣu buddhāḥ bodhisattvāśca tiṣṭhanti prayanti ca sarve te trikāla- samayamāgatya tamācāryyaṁ sarvatathāgatapūjābhiḥ saṁpūjya sarva- (63)
T02n2988u_001:1527: tadyathā- api nāma kulaputrā yāvanto buddhā bhagavanto daśasu dikṣu pracaranti teṣāṁ ca buddhānāṁ bhagavatāṁ yāvantaḥ kāyavākcittapuṇyaskandhā ācāryyasya romakūpāgravivare viśiṣyate |
T02n2988u_001:1529: bodhicittaṁ kulaputrāḥ sarvabuddhajñānānāṁ sārabhūta- mutpattibhūtaṁ yāvat sarvajñajñānākaramiti |
T02n2988u_001:1532: mahājñānaprabhavitamahāyogīśvarasya prabhāvaṁ kalpakoṭi- śatenāpi sarvatathāgatairapi na śakyaṁ varṇayitum |
T02n2988u_001:1533: śrīsambaroktaṁ kiñcinmātraṁ kathyate- sarvatra sarvataḥ sarvaṁ sarvathā sarvadā svayam |
T02n2988u_001:1557: ityāha bhagavān śrīvajrasattvaḥ- sarvaśuddhyadhimokṣeṇa prasahya balavānadhaḥ |
T02n2988u_001:1598: avasāne tu karttavyaṁ sarvabuddhāḥ sa aurasāḥ |
T02n2988u_001:1619: yadi cittaṁ samaṁ yasya jñānaṁ tasyodayaṁ bhavet |
T02n2988u_001:1628: tattvaṁ vinā na buddhatvaṁ tattvaṁ mārgaṁ vinā na [ca] |
T02n2988u_001:1638: vajrajñānavaro yogo yeṣāṁ naiva hi vidyate |
